org.libav.net.rtsp

Class RtspServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.libav.net.rtsp.RtspServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IConnectionHandlerFactory

    public class RtspServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements IConnectionHandlerFactory
    Implementation of the IConnectionHandlerFactory which allows to serve RTSP clients.
    Author:
    Ondrej Perutka

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RtspServer()
      Create a new RTSP server.

    • Method Detail

      • addMediaStream

        public void addMediaStream(java.lang.String path,
                  ISingleMediaStream mediaStream)
        Add a media stream which will be published within this RTSP server.
        Parameters:
        path - a path where the stream will be available
        mediaStream - a media stream to be published
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there is already a stream at the given path or the given path ends with "/trackId=[0-9]+"

      • addMediaStream

        public void addMediaStream(java.lang.String path,
                  IAggregateMediaStream mediaStream)
        Add an aggregate media stream which will be published within this RTSP server.
        Parameters:
        path - a path where the aggregate stream will be available
        mediaStream - an aggregate media stream to be published
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there is already a stream at the given path or the given path ends with "/trackId=[0-9]+"

      • removeMediaStream

        public void removeMediaStream(java.lang.String path)
        Remove media stream at the given path and release all its resources.
        Parameters:
        path - a path where to remove a media stream
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the media stream at the given path is a part of an aggregate media stream

      • getMediaStream

        public IMediaStream getMediaStream(java.lang.String path)
        Get media stream at the given path.
        Parameters:
        path - a path to the media stream
        Returns:
        a media stream or null if there is no media stream at the given path

      • createSession

        public RtspSession createSession()
        Create a new RTSP session.
        Returns:
        a new RTSP session

      • getSession

        public RtspSession getSession(java.lang.String id)
        Get RTSP with the given session ID.
        Parameters:
        id - a session ID
        Returns:
        RTSP session or null if there is no session with the given ID or the existing session expired

      • dropSession

        public void dropSession(java.lang.String id)
        Drop RTSP session with the given ID and release all its resources.
        Parameters:
        id - a session ID
